name: Stealth Dice
description:
When a new run begins, dice are rolled to determine the size/power of each of your three abilities. You have to adjust accordingly and make creative use of your abilities to complete levels. 

Every game is a gamble, as your powers change strength with each playthrough and each new level! The only game (on this side of the galaxy) where barrels shoot YOU. So what the hell, take a route with some chest hair!

Game submission for Game Maker's Toolkit GameJam 2022

Controls:

WASD - Movement
Keys: 1,2,3 - Abilities
Mouse - Look Around
P or ESC - Pauses the game

Developers:

Renato
Julia
Orhan
Okan

Credits:

CH Assets
The levels use remixed versions of music from artist Siddhartha Corsus

Known bugs:
1. At the start of the game, the player is unable to turn unless they are pressing one of the mouse buttons, this bug disappears once the player dies for the first time.
2. On many menu screens, the mouse is not visible, highlights of the choices is all you have to rely on.
3. Sound settings are not saving.
